RelatedSentence: Friends , neighbors remember Lawrence Peterson , ' Mayor of Mount Vernon ' For Lawrence Peterson , the redevelopment of his Mount Vernon neighborhood was every bit as much of a calling as his 20 years in the U.S. Navy .
